attributes.action: Intervene in the sell-off and development of County Property in Llangollen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Denbighshire has approached the private sector regarding the redevlopment of the Town's main car park into a multi-storey. Not only will this destroy the character of this beautiful town and favourite destination for many, many people, but it will kill local business. The last time tourists were prevented, many businesses failed. The County Council and the Town Council are being highly secretive. We need a voice that they will hear. Please sign this petition.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
